long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integration platform providing database driven screen pops. The B1 Communications app integrates with back-office applications using APIs. By leveraging APIs the B1 Communications extension will search any internal database and present the findings in a new window.  The B1 Communications app also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
